quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
Life is a beauty to those who know how to treat it like a princess. Your attitude towards life will determine how far you will go. Stop cursing and saying that it is no good.
You come into the world with nothing, and the purpose of your life is to make something out of nothing.
There are only two tragedies in life: one is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save.
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
And in the end it is not the years in your life that count, It's the life in your years.
The best portion of your life will be the small, nameless moments you spend smiling with someone who matters to you.
It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all.
Life is worth living as long as there's a laugh in it.
Life is like a cup of coffee or tea. No matter how bitter it may be, it is always enjoyable.
There's no fun in perfect life. So make a risk, Take a chance, Go where the wind takes you, Have Fun.
Weekends don't count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing. To keep our faces toward change and behave like free spirits in the presence of fate is strength undefeatable.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Life is like playing a violin in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
When life is sweet, say thank you and celebrate. And when life is bitter, say thank you and grow.
It's a funny thing about life: if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.
Life is like an onion: You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
Life is so largely controlled by chance that its conduct can be but a perpetual improvisation.
The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.

In life, I have met many friends and people whom I have loved dearly. All this has been possible because of a life full of joy happiness and peace. Humor is another factor which helped me on my way in life.
Man is immortal. Therefore he must die endlessly. For life is a creative idea. It can only find itself in changing forms.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Life is what happens to you while you're planning on doing something else.
Whatever anybody says, the most important thing in life is to be happy.
Life is a whim of several billion cells to be you for a while.
The cost of living is going up and the chance of living is going down.
When one door closes, another opens, but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
Life is the game that must be played.
To succeed in life, you need three things. A wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
Just living is not enough. One must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.
Life is not having been told that the man has just waxed the floor.
If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life. It goes on.
All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
Win as if you were used to it, lose as if you enjoyed it for a change.
The person who knows how to laugh at himself will never ceased to be amused.
If you don’t follow your heart, you might spend the rest of your life wishing you had.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal. Not to people or things.
The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
Life is too deep for words, so don't try to describe it, just live it.
Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
In life, unlike chess, the game continues after checkmate.
